paragraph.heading:
Dendrobium gibsonii Paxton
, Paxton’s Mag. Bot. 5: 169, t. unnumbered, 1838

subSubSection.paragraph:
Homotypic synonyms:
Callista gibsonii (Paxton) Kuntze, Revis.
Gen . Pl.
2: 654, 1891.
Dendrobium fimbriatum Hook. var. gibsonii (Paxton) Finet, Bull.
Mus . Natl. Hist. Nat .
9: 299, 1903.

Specimens examined:—
KACHIN . Putao District :
Younghusband s.n.
( K )
;

1220 m

,

;

Mar 2009

Kurzweil & Saw Lwin KL s.n.
[no. 5] ( SING )
.
MANDALAY . Kyaukse District :
Griffith s.n.
,
Kew Distr. 5052
( K )
.
BAGO . Unspecified : fide
Aung et al. (2020: 78)
.
TANINTHARYI . Myeik District :
Griffith s.n.
,
Mergui Herbarium 1040, Kew Distr. 5051
( K ). WITHOUT LOCALITY. Cult. Williams s.n. (not located), fide Grant (1895: 94). Reported from
Shan State by
Kress et al. (2003: 73)
, but we have not seen material from this area.
Distribution:— The central Himalayas, northeastern India , Myanmar , Thailand , Indochina and southwestern and southern China .

Dendrobium gratiosissimum Rchb.
f., Bot.Zeitung(Berlin) 23: 99,1865. Type :— MYANMAR . Mon State : Mawlamyine District ,
Parish 206
( holotype : K)

Homotypic synonym:
Callista gratiosissima
(Rchb.f.) Kuntze,
Revis. Gen . Pl.
2: 654, 1891.

Heterotypic synonyms:
Dendrobium bullerianum Bateman, Bot. Mag.
93: t. 5652, 1867. Type :— MYANMAR . Mon State : Mawlamyine District ,
Parish s.n.
, sent to Low , cult.
Buller s.n.
( holotype : K )
.

Dendrobium boxallii Rchb.
f., Gard. Chron. , n.s., 1: 315, 1874.
Callista boxallii
(Rchb.f.) Kuntze,
Revis. Gen . Pl.
2: 654, 1891. Type:— MYANMAR . Without locality: Boxall s.n. ( holotype : W-R).

Dendrobium boxallii Rchb.
f.
var. albanense Sander
, Sander’s Orch. Guide : 67, 1901. Type :— MYANMAR . Without locality: without collector s.n. (not located).

MON . Mawlamyine District : types cited; same loc.,
Parish 202
( K ). WITHOUT LOCALITY. Types ;

( K )

Reported from
Tanintharyi Region by
Kress et al. (2003: 73)
, but we have not seen material from this area.
Distribution:— Northeastern India , Myanmar , Thailand , Indochina and southwestern China .

paragraph.materialsCitation:
Possibly W-R 20980 is the type of
D. boxallii

subSubSection.paragraph:
Dendrobium griffithianum Lindl.
, Edwards’s Bot. Reg. 21: sub t. 1756, 1835. Type :— MYANMAR . Mon State : Mawlamyine District ,
Griffith 351
( holotype : K-LINDL)

Homotypic synonym:
Callista griffithiana (Lindl.) Kuntze, Revis.
Gen . Pl.
2: 654, 1891.

Heterotypic synonyms:
Dendrobium farmeri Paxton
var. aureo-flavum Hook.f., Bot. Mag . 90: t. 5451, 1864. Types :—? MYANMAR . Cult. Low s.n. [as Lowe] ( syntype : not located); WITHOUT ORIGIN . Cult. RBG Kew ( syntype K : not located)
.
